fields.request: Manual QA: Review CP purge confirmation summary
fields.request_details:
1. From the Charge Points admin changelist, select one or more chargers that already have transactions and meter values.
2. Run the Purge all CP data admin action and confirm an intermediate page appears summarizing the rows to be deleted per charge point, including totals.
3. Verify the totals match the underlying transaction and meter value counts, then confirm the purge and ensure the data is removed.
4. Return to the changelist and confirm the action now shows the updated 'Purge all CP data' label.
